Alleged Fundamental Right violation reported by an Afghan male migrant

records.context_note: An Afghan male migrant reported an alleged Fundamental Right violation. The narrative describes apprehension by Greek Police, confiscation of mobile phones without protocol, lack of registration at a Police Station, and subsequent transfer to Turkish territory after being taken to a river bank.
records.evidence_quote: Alleged Fundamental Right violation reported by an Afghan male migrant
